dc_title_s: Adult Mental Health Providers: Washington, D.C.
dc_description_s: Adult (Community-based) Mental Health Service ProvidersThe Department of Behavioral Health ensures that high quality mental health services are available to District residents through a rigorous certification program conducted by the Office of Accountability. DBH certifies a provider to deliver services that support individual recovery with qualified A provider also must comply with local and federal rules and regulations. Only a certified provider is eligible to participate in the District s public behavioral health system.
